name: Consequence (itch) (Bahble)
description:
A game created for the 2022 Games for Good  GameJam at IADE. 

By:
Daniel Gonçalves
Martim Norte
Pedro Freire
Rafael Vaz 

Buy and upgrade tiles to improve your revenue. You have 10 years to reach your goal.

Controls:  Mouse&Keyboard required 
LeftClick       - Interact with tiles and menus
RightClick    - Exit menus
Spacebar       - Pause/Unpause time
A/<                    - Slowdown time
D/>                    - Speedup time
